text: inn janaṅṅaḷil niṅṅaḷe tēālpikkān āruṁ tanneyilla. tīrccayāyuṁ ñān niṅṅaḷuṭe sanrakṣakanāyirikkuṁ. enn paṟaññ keāṇṭ piśāc avarkk avaruṭe ceytikaḷ bhaṅgiyāyi tēānnicca sandarbhavuṁ (ōrkkuka.) aṅṅane ā raṇṭusaṅghaṅṅaḷ kaṇṭumuṭṭiyappēāḷ enikku niṅṅaḷumāyi oru bandhavumilla, tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷ kāṇātta palatuṁ ñān kāṇunnuṇṭ‌, tīrccayāyuṁ ñān allāhuve bhayappeṭunnu, allāhu kaṭhinamāyi śikṣikkunnavanatre. enn paṟaññukeāṇṭ avan (piśāc‌) pinmāṟikkaḷaññu
